Name: Description
dataFormat: Special details related to data format (number of decimal places, date format, etc.
uniqueID: Does this field contain a unique ID or primary key?
permittedValues: Describes values permitted to be included in this field, if applicable
fieldPublicAccessLevel: Describes if this field is subject to any public access limitations (public, sensitive, private)
fieldPublicAccessLevelComment: An explanation for the field's selected “accessLevel” including instructions for how to access a restricted file, if applicable, or explanation for why a “non-public” or “restricted public” data asset is not “public,” if applicable. Also note options for making the data public, where appropriate, including obfuscation, aggregation, or anonymization.

fieldDescription: Crime Report Number associated with the incident
Date and time citation was issued
Location of incident, at block or intersection level
Police Zone where incident took place
The geocoded X coordinate of the incident location (using county geocoder)
The geocoded Y coordinate of the incident location (using county geocoder)
